title: An Easy Job
description: An Easy Job is a short story from Carrie Vaughn, the New York Times bestselling author of the Kitty Norville series.Graff's official role is muscle for the Visigoth--but his personal mission is internally cataloguing all of his experiences to relay to the other beings from his home planet when they cross paths. His professional life rarely clashes with his identity, but when he realizes his newest mission is to take down one of his kind, everything becomes a bit less simple.At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.
author: Carrie Vaughn
